assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Ajmera Realty & Infra India Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the real estate business in India, the United Kingdom, and Bahrain. It develops residential and commercial projects. The company was founded in 1985 and is based in Mumbai, India.
